name: Square Shoot Frenzy
description:
Hey guys

This is my first game which I made using Godot Engine solely to test myself with the Engine. So far, it made me want to use the game engine more.  It was fairly simple to make this game, and it's like an endless/infinite shooter (top down) game, basically shoot as many enemy cubes as you can and test your skills. 

NOTE: This game is only for Windows OS desktops/laptops only so far. My future games may probably be made for mobile, other OS', etc. too. :)
